## Move the legend to top right corner outside of the chart, no border 

```python
ax.legend(handles, labels, 
          bbox_to_anchor=[1.05,1], loc='upper left', 
          edgecolor='w', facecolor='none',
          borderpad=0, borderaxespad=0)
```
